channel.title: About Me on The Expat Tech
channel.description: Recent content in About Me on The Expat Tech

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi everyone! I’ve been working in IT for a long time—my first experiences go all the way back to playing on Apple IIe computers in 1983. One of the first “skills” I picked up was learning how to turn single-sided, double-density 5.25” floppy disks into double-sided disks using nothing more than a hole punch. I’ll also admit that I got into BBSes mainly so I could download games over a 300-baud modem.
